sys_hub_action_type_snapshot.annotation: This action will download a specified file from an AWS S3 bucket and attach it to a a target record such as an incident, change, problem, and any other table that supports record attachments.
sys_hub_action_type_snapshot.description: This action will download a specified file from an AWS S3 bucket and attach it to a a target record such as an incident, change, problem, and any other table that supports record attachments.
